name: Pipe Hero
description:
This is a short puzzle game about pipes and water, made in about 3 days for Dive Jam 2. There's a light story aspect that was originally going to be a bit more in depth. In the end I focused more on making sure the puzzle mechanics were working correctly. There's a sandboxish mode at the end where you can do whatever you want with all the parts.

There were some weird issues on some of my friends' computers in an earlier version, and I fear it could come back. If you think that a mechanic isn't working correctly (to the point where you're unable to pass a level) add a comment and I'll take a look.
